## Description and Rationale

A way to keep up in data science and aviation field.

## Details

* Country: Spain

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(gt)

gt(tibble::tribble(
  ~id, ~forename, ~surname,  ~affiliation,
   1L,  "Carlos", "Morote", "independent"
```
